title: Redesign website to match Australian Government visa check interface

requirements.text: Redesign the AustralianVisaCheckPage to match the Australian Government Department of Home Affairs website style shown in the uploaded image, including the dark blue header with the Australian Government coat of arms logo, navigation menu, and search icon

quotes: make the website like this i send you

acceptanceCriteria: Page header uses dark navy blue (#002554 or similar) matching the government website
Australian Government coat of arms logo is displayed in the header
Header includes 'Department of Home Affairs' text
Header includes hamburger menu icon and search icon on appropriate sides
Navigation breadcrumbs display below header (Home > Visas > When you have a visa)

requirements.text: Update the main content area to use the same blue background (#006CB5) as shown in the uploaded image with the heading 'Check visa details and conditions' in large white text

quotes: make the website like this i send you

acceptanceCriteria: Main content area uses bright blue background matching the reference image
Heading text 'Check visa details and conditions' is displayed in large white font
Content section includes expandable/collapsible 'Check conditions online (VEVO)' section with dropdown arrow

requirements.text: Maintain the existing functionality to check visa application status using reference number (applicationId) and email, ensuring the input fields are prominently displayed and clearly labeled

quotes: we can check reference number and email

acceptanceCriteria: Reference number input field is clearly visible and labeled
Email input field is clearly visible and labeled
Existing normalization logic for applicationId and email is preserved
useCheckApplicationStatus mutation hook continues to function correctly

requirements.text: Add navigation links in the header area matching the government website style, including 'ImmiAccount', 'Visa Entitlement Verification Online (VEVO)', and 'My Tourist Refund Scheme (TRS)'

quotes: make the website like this i send you

acceptanceCriteria: Three navigation links are displayed below the main header
Links are styled with white text on the dark blue background
Links maintain consistent spacing and alignment

constraints: Preserve existing backend functionality for application status checking
Maintain the useCheckApplicationStatus hook and normalization utilities
Keep the existing authentication and Internet Identity integration unchanged
Do not modify backend/main.mo or any backend logic
nonGoals: Implementing actual ImmiAccount, VEVO, or TRS functionality behind the navigation links
Creating a functional hamburger menu with navigation
Implementing search functionality for the search icon
Modifying the Dashboard or other authenticated pages
Changing the backend API or data models

required: Australian Government coat of arms logo in white/light color suitable for dark blue header background (aus-govt-logo.dim_200x80.png)
